import ResponsiveMenu from 'react-responsive-navbar'; import { Button, Box, Flex, Image, Heading } from '@chakra-ui/core'; import { RiMenuLine, RiCloseLine } from 'react-icons/ri'; const Navbar = (props) => { return ( LOGO } menuCloseButton={ LOGO } changeMenuOn='500px' largeMenuClassName='large-menu-classname' smallMenuClassName='small-menu-classname' menu={
Crewdemy Cursos Presenciales Nostros Crewsoft Crewdemy live
} /> ); }; export default Navbar;
